SELECT i.user_id userId,e.attr_spec_id attrId,e.attr_value attrValue FROM prod_inst_user_ext e LEFT JOIN prod_inst_user_info i ON e.u_id = i.u_id and i.tenant_id=#tenantId# and e.tenant_id =#tenantId# WHERE 1 = 1
e.u_id IN (#uIds#)
ORDER BY e.attr_seq

SELECT i.so_nbr soNber, c.cust_id custId, c.state state, m.maind_id userTypeId, m.cep_name userType, c.company_name companyName, c.first_name firstName, c.mid_name midName, c.last_name lastName, c.country country FROM cust_info c LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM main_data m WHERE m.mdt_cd = #CRMORDER_CUST_TYPE_ID# and m.tenant_id=#tenantId#) m ON c.cust_type_id = m.cep_code LEFT JOIN cust_order_info i ON c.order_id = i.order_id where 1 = 1 and c.tenant_id =#tenantId# and i.tenant_id=#tenantId#
c.order_id = #orderId#

SELECT c.order_id orderId, c.order_nbr orderNbr, c.so_nbr soNbr, m.maind_id cepId, m.cep_name cepName, DATE_FORMAT(c.accept_date, '%Y-%m-%d') acceptDate, c.contry_code countryCode, c.locality locality, c.main_server_id mainServerId, n.maind_id tradeTypeCodeId, n.cep_name tradeTypeCode, c.proc_id procId, c.orignal_so_nbr orignalSoNbr, t.maind_id orderStatusId, t.cep_name orderStatus FROM cust_order_info c LEFT JOIN cust_order_item i ON c.order_id = i.order_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT md.* FROM main_data md, main_data_type mt WHERE md.mdt_cd=mt.mdt_cd and md.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.mdt_sign='CRM_ORDER_TYPE') m ON c.so_type = m.cep_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT md.* FROM main_data md, main_data_type mt WHERE md.mdt_cd=mt.mdt_cd and md.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.mdt_sign='CRMORDER_TRADE_TYPE_CODE') n ON i.trade_type_code = n.cep_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT md.* FROM main_data md, main_data_type mt WHERE md.mdt_cd=mt.mdt_cd and md.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.mdt_sign='CRM_ORDER_STATUS') t ON c.order_status = t.cep_code WHERE 1 = 1 and c.tenant_id =#tenantId# and i.tenant_id=#tenantId#
c.order_id = #orderId#

SELECT c.order_id orderId, c.order_nbr orderNbr, c.so_nbr soNbr, m.maind_id cepId, m.cep_name cepName, DATE_FORMAT(c.accept_date, '%Y-%m-%d') acceptDate, c.contry_code countryCode, c.locality locality, c.main_server_id mainServerId, n.maind_id tradeTypeCodeId, n.cep_name tradeTypeCode, c.proc_id procId, s.sub_proc_id subProcId, t.maind_id orderStatusId, t.cep_name orderStatusName FROM cust_order_info c LEFT JOIN cust_order_item i ON c.order_id = i.order_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT md.* FROM main_data md, main_data_type mt WHERE md.mdt_cd=mt.mdt_cd and md.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.mdt_sign='CRM_ORDER_TYPE') m ON c.so_type = m.cep_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT md.* FROM main_data md, main_data_type mt WHERE md.mdt_cd=mt.mdt_cd and md.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.mdt_sign='CRMORDER_TRADE_TYPE_CODE') n ON i.trade_type_code = n.cep_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT md.* FROM main_data md, main_data_type mt WHERE md.mdt_cd=mt.mdt_cd and md.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.tenant_id=#tenantId# and mt.mdt_sign='CRM_ORDER_STATUS') t ON c.order_status = t.cep_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM bpm_act_his WHERE act_name = 'sub-process' and tenant_id =#tenantId# ) s ON c.proc_id = s.proc_id WHERE 1 = 1 and c.tenant_id =#tenantId# and i.tenant_id=#tenantId#
c.so_nbr LIKE CONCAT('%',#soNbr#,'%')
c.order_nbr LIKE CONCAT('%',#orderNbr#,'%')
c.so_type = #soType#
c.accept_date >= #startAcceptDate#
c.accept_date <= #endAcceptDate#
c.tenant_id=#tenantId#
c.main_server_id in
#mainServiceId[]#
ORDER BY c.order_id DESC LIMIT #pro_mysql#,#page_record#
